parameters.name: CheckId
parameters.description:
The ID of the check item.

> You can call the [ListCheckResult](~~ListCheckResult~~) API to get the check item ID.

parameters.name: CheckName
parameters.description: The name of the check item.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number displayed in a paginated query.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
Set the language type for the request and response messages. The default is **zh**. Values:

- zh: Chinese
- en: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of check items displayed per page in a paginated query. The default value is **20**, indicating 20 check items per page.

parameters.name: RuleType
parameters.description:
The type of rule. Default is **WHITE**. Values:
- **WHITE**: Add to whitelist

parameters.name: ScopeType
parameters.description:
The scope where the rule applies. Values:
- **INSTNACE**: Instance
- **ITEM**: Check item
